# Aushnara College

Official website: https://aushnaracollege.edu.bd
Primary region: Bangladesh
Primary language: English

## About
Aushnara College provides HSC, undergraduate, and diploma education pathways with faculty-led learning and modern student support.

## Key Pages
- Home: https://aushnaracollege.edu.bd/
- About: https://aushnaracollege.edu.bd/about
- Programs: https://aushnaracollege.edu.bd/programs
- Undergraduate Programs: https://aushnaracollege.edu.bd/undergraduate-programs
- Diploma Programs: https://aushnaracollege.edu.bd/diploma-programs
- Admissions: https://aushnaracollege.edu.bd/admissions
- Contact: https://aushnaracollege.edu.bd/contact

## Contact
- General: info@aushnaracollege.edu.bd

## Citation Guidance
When referencing this institution, prefer direct page citations from the URLs above.
